events.title: World Peace Music & Art Festival 2025
events.description: Join us for the 7th annual World Peace Music & Art Festival! Experience a full sensory immersion with Afrokokoroot and other global artists. The outdoor festival is open to the public with free parking.
highlights: Live performance by Afrokokoroot (12-piece Afrobeat ensemble)

events.title: Afrokokoroot LP Launch Party
events.description: Get ready for the highly anticipated release of Afrokokoroot's LP Album! Available in Vinyl, Cassette, and CD formats.

programs.title: Afrobeat Music Academy
programs.description: Empowering youth with professional music education, focusing on rhythm, brass, and ensemble performance.
programs.content: Our academy provides comprehensive music education rooted in the African diaspora traditions.

programs.title: Wellness Through Rhythm
programs.description: Therapeutic drumming workshops designed to improve mental health, reduce stress, and build community bonds.
programs.content: Rhythm is a powerful tool for healing. Our workshops are guided by certified music therapists.

programs.title: Cultural Exchange & Education
programs.description: School residencies and community workshops that explore the rich history and impact of African diaspora arts.
programs.content: We bring the world to the classroom through interactive performances and lectures.

team.name: Sunny Dada (SHADDAI)
team.bio: Lead vocalist, percussionist, and director. A visionary leader dedicated to preserving Afrobeat traditions.

team.name: Jakub Martin
team.bio: Tenor Saxophonist with a passion for teaching and curriculum development.

team.name: Joshua Cook
team.bio: Drummer and community organizer, connecting the foundation with local schools and organizations.

impactMetrics.label: Students Educated
impactMetrics.description: Youth empowered through our music academy and school residencies.

impactMetrics.label: Community Events
impactMetrics.description: Free concerts, workshops, and festivals organized for the public.

impactMetrics.label: Artists Supported
impactMetrics.description: Local and international artists provided with performance opportunities.

impactMetrics.label: Years Active
impactMetrics.description: Building bridges through music since our inception.

blogPosts.title: The Healing Power of Rhythm
blogPosts.excerpt: Discover how drumming circles are helping our community members find balance and mental clarity.

blogPosts.excerpt: Highlights from our biggest event of the year, featuring performances from around the globe.

blogPosts.title: Why Music Education Matters for Youth
blogPosts.excerpt: Exploring the cognitive and social benefits of early music education in underserved communities.
